title: Boys' Waterproof Winter Jacket
description: The Boys' Waterproof Winter Jacket in Navy, size 6, by Arctic Explorer is a perfect choice for young adventurers. This jacket features a waterproof outer shell, insulated lining, and a detachable hood with faux fur trim. Multiple pockets offer ample storage, and the adjustable cuffs and hem ensure a snug fit. Ideal for outdoor activities, this jacket provides ultimate protection from the elements, keeping your child warm and dry during winter adventures.
key_features: Detachable hood with faux fur trim
meta_description: Shop the Boys' Waterproof Winter Jacket in Navy, size 6. Features waterproof outer shell, insulated lining, and detachable hood. Ideal for winter adventures.
